200.description: A url to the stored image

get.description: Returns all registrations for the current user with tournament information

200.description: List of registrations with tournament details

post.description: Creates new registration or updates existing CANCELED status to PENDING
Cancels registration with PENDING status (before payment)
Cancels registration with ACTIVE status (after payment)
Reactivates registration from CANCELED_BY_USER status to ACTIVE
Creates a new tournament. Requires telegram admin rights.

delete.description: Deletes a tournament. Only the tournament organizer can delete their tournament.

403.description: Not tournament organizer or admin rights required

patch.description: Updates tournament data. Only the tournament organizer can update their tournament.

403.description: Not tournament organizer or admin rights required

get.description: Get list of users in tournament waitlist

post.description: Add authenticated user to tournament waitlist. Checks that tournament has not ended.

400.description: Invalid tournament ID or tournament has ended

delete.description: Remove authenticated user from tournament waitlist

404.description: Tournament not found or user not in waitlist

200.description: List of tournaments where user participated

isAvalible.description: true if tournament is not started and not full
